idea-plugin.name: D8gerAutoCode
idea-plugin.description:
Automatic code generation plugin.
Single-table add, delete, update, search with paging and batch operate in one click.
自动生成代码插件, 单表增删改查+分页一键搞定.

    2.0

  • Camel-Underline-Uppercase-Lowercase can be converted to each other
    by shortcut `alt` + `shift` + `ctrl` + `U`
  • The comments of generated codes support
    English(Default) | Chinese Simplified(Optional) configuration
  • JSON string auto formatting, default shortcut `alt`+`shift`+`cmd`+`J`
  • Stripping whitespace and simplifying text into a single line,
    default shortcut `alt`+`shift`+`cmd`+`S`
  • One-click generation of data table definition SQL / Mapper / Service / Controller,
    single table addition, deletion, modification and search + paging in one click
  • Combined with SwaggerApi, one-click generation of Vo
    and Controller with document definition, support Vo automatic sorting
  • For smart coding, default shortcut `alt`+`shift`+`cmd`+`D`
  • Support user-defined configuration,
    specify which files and file authors are generated, etc.
  • Reserve Easter eggs, edit the blank file in IDEA and enter 'd8ger'
    to get the configuration file template.
  • Reserve Easter eggs, edit the blank file in IDEA and enter 'regex'
    to get some commonly used regular expressions.
    Other code Easter eggs will be added later
  • SwaggerVo field auto sorting, default shortcut `alt`+`shift`+`cmd`+`O`
By the way, these default shortcuts are used in Mac OS,
if you use Windows just take `cmd` into `ctrl`

    2.0

  • 驼峰下划线-大小写一键转换, 默认快捷键`alt` + `shift` + `ctrl` + `U`
  • 生成代码的注释支持英语|汉语配置
  • JSON字符串格式化, 默认快捷键`alt`+`shift`+`cmd`+`J`
  • 去除空白字符, 简化为单行文本, 默认快捷键`alt`+`shift`+`cmd`+`J`
  • 一键生成数据表定义SQL/Mapper/Service/Controller, 单表增删改查+分页一键搞定
  • 结合SwaggerApi, 一键生成带文档定义Vo及Controller, 支持Vo自动排序
  • 一键智能编程, 默认快捷键`alt`+`shift`+`cmd`+`D`
  • 支持用户自定义配置, 指定生成哪些文件及文件author等
  • 预留彩蛋, 在IDEA中编辑空白文件输入'd8ger'即可得到配置文件模板
  • 预留彩蛋, 在IDEA中编辑空白文件输入'regex'即可得到一些常用的有趣正则表达式,
    后期会增加其他代码彩蛋
  • SwaggerVo字段排序, 默认快捷键`alt`+`shift`+`cmd`+`O`
另外, 以上默认快捷键针对MacOS系统, 对于Windows用户将`cmd`看做`ctrl`即可
So, How To Use?
